#summary pixmap widget reference

= pixmap widget =

A [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkImage.html GtkImage]

----

== Definition ==

{{{
<pixmap tag_attr="value"...>
	<variable>varname</variable>
	<height>value</height>
	<width>value</width>
	<input file>filename</input>
	<input file icon="image"></input>
	<input file stock="gtk-image"></input>
	<sensitive>state</sensitive>
</pixmap>
}}}

"..." denotes acceptance of multiples of the same thing.

== Tag Attributes ==

See the [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkImage.html#GtkImage.object-hierarchy GtkImage] widget and ancestor class properties.

The following custom tag attributes are available:

<wiki:comment>ExportTableStart</wiki:comment>
|| *Name* || *Description* || *Value* || *Since* ||
|| space-expand || Pack widget expanding into space || {{{true}}} or {{{false}}} || 0.7.21 ||
|| space-fill || Pack widget filling space || {{{true}}} or {{{false}}} || 0.7.21 ||
|| block-function-signals || Block signal emissions from functions || {{{true}}} or {{{false}}} || 0.7.21 ||
|| file-monitor || Monitor input file(s) for changes || {{{true}}} or {{{false}}} || 0.8.1 ||
|| rate-limit || The file monitor limit in milliseconds || An integer >= {{{10}}} || 0.8.1 ||
|| theme-icon-size || The size of the GTK theme icon || An integer > {{{0}}} or {{{-1}}} to ignore || 0.8.1 ||
|| stock-icon-size || The size of the GTK stock icon || {{{0}}} to {{{6}}} (see [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/gtk-Themeable-Stock-Images.html#GtkIconSize GtkIconSize]) || 0.8.1 ||
<wiki:comment>ExportTableEnd</wiki:comment>

== Directives ==

Some of these may have tag attribute equivalents.

<wiki:comment>ExportTableStart</wiki:comment>
|| *Name* || *Description* || *Contents* || *Mandatory* || *Since* ||
|| variable || Shell variable name || || || ||
|| height || Image scaling dimension || An integer > {{{0}}} or {{{-1}}} to ignore || || 0.7.21 ||
|| width || Image scaling dimension || An integer > {{{0}}} or {{{-1}}} to ignore || || 0.7.21 ||
|| input file || Data input source || Image filename || (0) || ||
|| input file icon="_image_"^[1]^ || GTK theme icon name  || || (0) || 0.7.21 ||
|| input file stock="_gtk-image_"^[2]^ || GTK stock icon ID || {{{gtk-about}}}, {{{gtk-add}}}, ... ([http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/gtk-Stock-Items.html#GTK-STOCK-ABOUT:CAPS full list]) || (0) || ||
|| sensitive || Sensitive state || {{{true}}} or {{{false}}} || || 0.7.21 ||
<wiki:comment>ExportTableEnd</wiki:comment>

== Signals ==

There is no default signal for this widget.

The "file-changed" signal is emitted if file-monitor is true and the input file being monitored has changed.

The following GtkWidget signals are connected-up for all widgets:
"[http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-button-press-event button-press-event]", "[http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-button-release-event button-release-event]", "[http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-configure-event configure-event]", "[http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-enter-notify-event enter-notify-event]", "[http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-leave-notify-event leave-notify-event]", "[http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-focus-in-event focus-in-event]", "[http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-focus-out-event focus-out-event]", "[http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-hide hide]", "[http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-show show]", "[http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-key-press-event key-press-event]", "[http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-key-release-event key-release-event]", "[http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-map-event map-event]", "[http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkWidget.html#GtkWidget-unmap-event unmap-event]"

== Functions ==

The following functions can be performed upon this widget by any widget capable of emitting signals:

<wiki:comment>ExportTableStart</wiki:comment>
|| *Type* || *Description* || *Parameter* || *Since* ||
|| enable || Sensitise widget || Shell variable name || ||
|| disable || Desensitise widget || Shell variable name || ||
|| show || Show widget || Shell variable name || 0.8.1 ||
|| hide || Hide widget || Shell variable name || 0.8.1 ||
|| refresh || Reload input data || Shell variable name || 0.7.21 ||
<wiki:comment>ExportTableEnd</wiki:comment>

== Notes ==

1. Theme icons default to 32 and do not scale or refresh (the "theme-icon-size" custom tag attribute can be used to request a size).

2. Stock icons default to GTK_ICON_SIZE_DND and do not scale or refresh (the "stock-icon-size" custom tag attribute can be used to request a size).
